thread.title: Young Thug and Migos Announce Joint Mixtape 'MigoThuggin'
thread.title_full: Young Thug and Migos Announce Joint Mixtape 'MigoThuggin'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Young Thug and Migos Announce Joint Mixtape 'MigoThuggin'
text:
Comments Thugger reveals that the collaborative tape is underway while his long-awaited debut album has yet to have a release date. 
Young Thug and Migos have a joint mixtape underway. Over the weekend, Thugger started teasing it in an Instagram video which he captioned, "The tape OTW!" Migos' Quavo later confirmed the project titled " MigoThuggin " with a clip he shared on his own Instagram account and what might be the tape's cover art on Twitter. Thug and Migos won't be the first hip-hop act to release a collaborative effort. A few weeks before they announced "MigoThugging", Drake linked up with Future for a surprise mixtape called " What a Time to Be Alive " which debuted at No. 1 on Billboard 200 in late September with the third-largest sales week of 2015. A video posted by QuavoHuncho (@quavohuncho) on Oct 3, 2015 at 5:07pm PDT — MIGOSâ�¢ (@Migos) October 4, 2015 There's still no official word on when Thug and Migos' mixtape will arrive. In addition to the newly-announced set, Thug is working on a sequel to his " Slime Season " mixtape and his debut album " Hy!£UN35 ". Recently, he delayed a bunch of dates on his headlining tour so he could focus on the long-awaited LP.
